Title: Gervaise
Writer: Émile Zola (novel), Jean Aurenche, Pierre Bost
Actors: Maria Schell, François Périer, Jany Holt, Mathilde Casadesus
Plot: Gervaise Macquart, a young lame laundress, is left by her lover Auguste Lantier with two boys... She manages to make it, and a few years later she marries Coupeau, a roofer. After working very hard a few more years, she succeeds in buying her own laundry (her dream)... But Coupeau starts to drink after having fallen from a roof, and Lantier shows up... A faithful adaptation of Emile Zola's novel "L'Assomoir", depicting the fatal degeneration of a family of workers, mainly because of alcohol.
Awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 10 wins & 2 nominations.
